page.title: 08THE WOMENS INSTITUTE
page.content: The Womens Institute started 22 years ago before a separating split from Horsington.There is a meeting monthly. They also do some shows,garden shows. They opened 12 shows last year.30 members usally go out on an outing. There is a Christmas party.Once a year Â£116 goes to charity.Cakes are made and sold on a cake stall.Handicrafts for '1985'expedition to go to Wells. There is a commity of 10 Secretary and President are the main people in the Institute.11 months a year a meeting is held,missing out August.There are lectures and time checks Sometimes.N Cheriton and Holton are combined. Evening meetings last about 2 and a half hours and a half .Sometimes they go to other meetings.other members go out together.10 groups are based in Somerset.All members run the diffrent stalls.
